T02D3271:24a-1: sam kshipta dzambha la s'a dha nam /
T02D3271:24a-3: mdor bsdus pa'i dzambha la'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3271:24a-4: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga'i rim pas snying ga'i sna
T02D3271:24a-5: tshogs padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge
T02D3271:24a-6: dzam ser po las gyur par spros pa'i 'od zer
T02D3271:24a-7: gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams legs par mchod
T02D3271:24a-8: cing sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas te
T02D3271:24a-9: / dus phyis stong pa nyid mngon du byas la /
T02D3271:24a-10: gnas de nyid du sna tshogs padma dang zla ba
T02D3271:24a-11: la dzam las byung ba'i shing thog sa bon gyi
T02D3271:24a-12: thum po ste sa bon gyi snying po dang ldan
T02D3271:24a-13: pa'o // de dag gi 'od zer gyis sems can gyi don rnam pa du ma rnams byas nas /
T02D3271:24a-14: de dag yongs su gyur pa las dzambha la 'tsher ba'i gser gyi mdog lta bu ste /
T02D3271:24a-15: sangs rgyas lnga'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan can //
T02D3271:24a-17: lha rdzas kyi gos dang rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02D3271:24a-18: phyag g-yas pas sa bon gyi rdog ma bsnams shing /
T02D3271:24a-19: g-yon pas ni kha nas rin po che sna tshogs skyug pa'i ne'u le'o //
T02D3271:24a-20: autpala sngon po'i phreng ba dang ldan pa /
T02D3271:24a-21: rin po che'i snye ma grungs pa mdzes pa phyogs
T02D3271:24a-22: gnyis ka na legs par gnas pa las ni phyogs
T02D3271:24a-23: gnyis kar char 'bab par gyur pa /
T02D3271:24a-24: rin po che'i snye ma mdzes pa dang bum pa
T02D3271:24a-25: du ma 'od zer kun nas 'bar bas dkrigs pa
T02D3271:24a-26: zhabs kyi 'og na gnas par gyur par bdag nyid
T02D3271:24a-27: la so sor rnam par bsam par bya ba'o //
T02D3271:24a-28: aom dzambha la dza lendra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3271:24a-29: bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya ba yin no //
T02D3271:24a-30: lag pa gnyis kyi khu tshur bcings la gung mo
T02D3271:24a-31: tshigs gsum pa bkug par gyur pa'i phyag rgyas snyid
T02D3271:24a-34: spyi bo rnams su gtug par bya ba'o //
T02D3271:24a-35: nang par snga mor de ltar skad cig gis bsgoms
T02D3271:24a-36: la snyim pa'i tshad kyis chu lan brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D3271:24a-38: aom dzambha la dza lendr'a ya dha nam me de hi sv'a h'a /
T02D3271:24b-0: mdor bsdus @24b pa'i dzambha la'i sgrub thabs so /
